Text: The liquidation of the world's oldest travel company, which specialized in low-cost package vacations that included flights and accommodation in more than 60 destinations around the world, has set in motion what was being described as the biggest peacetime repatriation in British history, as the government announced plans to bring back 150,000 Britons.
Cause: The liquidation of the world's oldest travel company, which specialized in low-cost package vacations that included flights and accommodation in more than 60 destinations around the world, has set in motion what was being described as the biggest peacetime repatriation in British history
Effect: the government announced plans to bring back 150,000 Britons.
Sentence: <e1>The liquidation of the world's oldest travel company, which specialized in low-cost package vacations that included flights and accommodation in more than 60 destinations around the world, has set in motion what was being described as the biggest peacetime repatriation in British history</e1>, as <e2>the government announced plans to bring back 150,000 Britons.</e2>
